page.title: 01INTRODUCTION-PORTPATRICK A
page.content: This survey grid mostly covers sea but contains,in less than one square kilometre,about one-third of the village,including the harbour, lifeboat station, H.M.Coastguard Station,Portpatrick Coastal Radio Station,the bowling and putting greens,car parks,most of the local golf course,the Public Hall and the largest hotel in the village. All but the last mentioned will be detailed in this survey.For other information concerning the village please refer to survey grid {02000552, PORTPATRICK B,}which covers the remainder of the village and surrounding countryside.
